stochasticscenarios 1.4.0

    • Floor option

    rDefaultSpread

    rDefaultSpread.Rd

    Direct default spread generation. Object creation is managed internally.

    rDefaultSpread(horizon, nScenarios, defaultSpread0,
    volDefault, alpha, beta)

    Arguments

    horizon

    Horizon of projection

    nScenarios

    Number of scenarios

    defaultSpread0

    Initial value for default spread

    volDefault

    Volatility

    alpha

    alpha for LMN model

    beta

    beta Volatility for LMN model

    Examples

    rDefaultSpread(horizon=5, nScenarios=8, defaultSpread0=.01, volDefault=.2, alpha=.1, beta=1)
#>      [,1]       [,2]       [,3]       [,4]       [,5]       [,6]
#> [1,] 0.01 0.05668147 0.11560420 0.26518740 0.31916408 0.40792013
#> [2,] 0.01 0.05615513 0.18555822 0.21018254 0.12571108 0.15122753
#> [3,] 0.01 0.04901402 0.14039516 0.23670514 0.30487680 0.49988970
#> [4,] 0.01 0.07971482 0.14676294 0.19779900 0.14392700 0.09455780
#> [5,] 0.01 0.05079965 0.11637164 0.12013709 0.22817528 0.15063031
#> [6,] 0.01 0.05845838 0.09599808 0.09808014 0.05564542 0.07575106
#> [7,] 0.01 0.15739760 0.18070150 0.17245053 0.35556649 0.38901081
#> [8,] 0.01 0.05952542 0.04418679 0.04558458 0.07186874 0.25390810
